'''Guardian's Band''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Defender's Will]].

==Description==
Always have a backup plan—<br />He wore this headband to remind himself of that axiom.<br />In an emergency, it could also serve as a tourniquet.

By this creed he taught his swordsmanship to the knights under his friend's command.<br />By this credo he also mentored a [[Bloodstained Knight|white knight]] who loved justice above all else.<br />In its name he nipped many seedling that might have blossomed into evil in the bud.

As long as he was sufficiently prepared,<br />Even if one day, he should be unable to defend this land,<br />Or protect his friend, or that maiden who loved to sing...
